title: Application of Big Data for Better Decision Management in Banking
abstract: The revolution in big data technologies in the 21st century in each sector is witnessed by various real-time applications within which the banking sector has no exception. Big data has actually helped in the detection of frauds, threats, and thefts in the banking sector, and also in preventing them. It can help banks in extracting useful information by observing consumer behaviour by understanding and establishing a better connect with their customers. Banks can use big data in the raw form that is available, and obtain valuable insights. Banks have started to extract the power of data across the different sectors in which they perform, such as, regulatory compliance management, financial crime management, product cross selling, sentiment analysis, etc. These latest trends are being observed globally. Big data can help in enabling better decision making in the banking sector.
